solution_line_template: If there were {total_visitors} visitors, and {ill_percentage}*{total_visitors} = <<{ill_percentage}*{total_visitors}={visitors_fell_ill}>>{visitors_fell_ill} people
The number of visitors who did not get ill is {total_visitors}-{visitors_fell_ill} = <<{total_visitors}-{visitors_fell_ill}={visitors_not_ill}>>{visitors_not_ill}
